author: rcm
msg: Added identified border to class icon.

author: rcm
msg: Fixed Date and Time Period tests.  By setting the locale when the class is loaded then the format will be set up in Date and Time when they are loaded.

author: rcm
msg: Set the size of the root tree in the tree browser frame so that it is at least as high as the right hand pane.  A default minimum height is hard code.
Added mark-damaged listing to the spy window.

author: rcm
msg: Fixed bug where TreeNodeBorder was repeatedly loading the same image.
Refactored ImageFactory and related classes.  Added in mechanism to track unloaded images and to ignore requests for them rather than attempting to reload them (and then failling again).
